Trade/Device Name(s): OneTouch Ultra Plus Flex Blood Glucose Monitoring System
OneTouch Ultra Plus Flex Blood Glucose Meter
OneTouch Ultra Plus Level 3 Control Solution
OneTouch Ultra Plus Level 4 Control Solution
Submitter Information: LifeScan Europe, a Division of Cilag GmbH International
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): OneTouch Ultra Plus Flex Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for OneTouch Ultra Plus Flex Blood Glucose Monitoring System for self-monitoring of blood glucose by diabetic patients using electrochemical detection.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip for self-testing by people with diabetes at home as an aid to monitor diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
